markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Climb](/Feats.aspx?ID=5192) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

When Climbing, you move 5 more feet on a success and 10 more feet on a critical success, up to your Speed. If you’re legendary in Athletics, you gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed.
name: Quick Climb

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 7" pfs="Standard" > Quick Climb Source Player Core pg. 260 2.0 Prerequisites Master in Athletics --- When Climbing, you move 5 more feet on a success and 10 more feet on a critical success, up to your Speed. If you’re legendary in Athletics, you gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed.
